baby_creeper_gold.label: Golden Creeper
baby_creeper_gold.descriptionObtained: You unlocked this companion by joining Iskall85's Gemstone event streams and collecting 50 gemstones with your companion.
baby_creeper_gold.descriptionLocked: No longer obtainable. This companion was unlockable by joining Iskall85's Gemstone event streams and collecting 50 gemstones with your companion.

baby_creeper_pog.label: POG Creeper
baby_creeper_pog.descriptionObtained: You unlocked this companion by being present for Iskall85's Gemstone event and placing within the top 123 players.
baby_creeper_pog.descriptionLocked: No longer obtainable. This companion was unlockable by being present for Iskall85's Gemstone event and placing within the top 123 players.

golden_kappa.label: Golden Kappa
golden_kappa.descriptionObtained: You obtained this shield by having an awake companion during a Golden Kappa Hype Train on Twitch.
golden_kappa.descriptionLocked: Obtain this shield by having an awake companion during a Golden Kappa Hype Train on Twitch.

dylan_vip.label: Dylan VIP
dylan_vip.descriptionObtained: You obtained this set when Iskall85 personally gifted it to you live on Twitch.
dylan_vip.descriptionLocked: This exclusive set can only be obtained when Iskall85 personally gifts it to you live on Twitch.

companion_leader_s1.label: Companion Leader S1

companion_leader_s1.descriptionLocked: Earn this set by getting your companion to level 12 during an Iskall85 stream.

i85_royale_crown.label: Royale Crown
